actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Ebey's Landing National Historical Park in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands in Puget Sound, Washington, for the preservation of the Central Whidbey Island Historic District. Designates such property the Ebey's Landing National Historical Park. Empowers the Secretary to enter into cooperative agreements with the State of Washington, its political subdivisions, corporations, associations, or individuals for preservation of nationally significant historic sites.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Ebey's Landing National Historical Park in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
